Camera.Flash:: Color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama
Camera.Second camera:: 50 MP, (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, optical zoom

Design.Materials:: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back or glass fiber back
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Design.Resistance::
IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
RGB LED light on the back
Color-changing rear panel

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 4 major Android upgrades, OriginOS 6 (China)
Hardware.Processor:: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Connectivity & Features.Bluetooth:: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5
